flawed_nl_solution:
Nora has saved 5*6 = <<5*6=30>>30 dollars
This means that Tamara has saved 30/3 = <<30/3=10>>10 dollars
All together, they have saved 30 + 10 + 6 = <<30+10+6=46>>46 dollars
If they pay off the debt they will remain with 46 - 40 = <<46-40=3>>3 dollars
Dividing the remaining money equally will give each girl 3/3 = <<3/3=1>>1 dollars.
#### 1

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 6, not 3. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
